steps.name: Make shortbread
steps.description: Mix sugar and flour then rub in butter. Press into a 20x30cm tin and bake at 160 for 25 minutes.

steps.name: Make raspberry juice
steps.description: Mix raspberries and water in a pan, heat for 15 minutes, mash and strain out the pips.

steps.name: Make caramel
steps.description: Melt butter and sugar in a pan, add condensed milk, raspberry juice and optional pink food colouring then heat and stir for 10 minutes.

steps.name: Assemble
steps.description: Once caramel has cooled slightly, pour it over the shortbread.

steps.name: Decorate
steps.description: Melt the white and ruby chocolates separately. Pour the white over the caramel then flick with ruby and feather horizontally and vertically.

steps.name: Cut
steps.description:
Wait until the chocolate is just set then cut the chocolate into squares with a sharp knife. Don't cut through the caramel.
Set the whole thing in the fridge, then cut all the way through along the same lines.
